member.name: M:CSServerJsonProtocol.JsonProtocolExension.SendJsonResponseToUsers(CSharpServerFramework.ICSharpServerExtension,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CSharpServerFramework.ICSharpServerUser},System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: 发送的数据，发送数据时会将Object转换成Json格式的字符串发送
